prompt: Create a driving licence application form. Ask for name, email, date of birth, preferred contact methods, automatic or manual, and to explain any health problems. Tell them they must be a UK resident and over 17 years old before they start.

expected.before_you_start: You must be a UK resident and at least 17 years old to complete this form.
expected.description: This form collects your details to apply for a driving licence in the UK.
expected.explanation: This form is designed to gather the necessary information for a driving licence application following UK residency and age requirements. The questions are structured to confirm eligibility before collecting specific details about the applicant's preferences and health. The eligibility criteria include being a UK resident and at least 17 years of age, which informs the structure and sequence of the questions.

questions.hint_text: Enter your full name as it appears on official documents
questions.question_text: What is your name?

questions.hint_text: Enter a valid email address for contact
questions.question_text: What is your email address?
What is your date of birth?

questions.hint_text: Select how we should contact you regarding your application
questions.question_text: How do you want to be contacted?
questions.required_error_text: Select at least one contact method

questions.hint_text: Select your preference for type of vehicle
questions.question_text: Do you prefer an automatic or manual licence?

questions.hint_text: Provide details of any relevant health issues
questions.question_text: Do you have any health problems that may affect your driving?

expected.title: Apply for a driving licence
expected.what_happens_next: After you submit the form, your application will be processed, and you will receive information on the next steps via your preferred contact method.

prompt: Create a form to apply for a replacement library card from Devon County Council. Ask for their name, address, email address, whether they know their previous card number, and if so what the number is.

expected.before_you_start: You should have your personal information ready. If you know your previous library card number, have it available to help speed up the application process.
expected.description: This form is for Devon County Council library users who need to apply for a replacement library card. Fill in the details below to process your application.
expected.explanation: The form is created to facilitate the application for a replacement library card specifically from Devon County Council. It includes essential details typically required for such a request, assuming that the user may or may not remember their previous card number.

questions.question_text: What is your name?
What is your address?

questions.hint_text: Enter a valid email address for correspondence
questions.question_text: What is your email address?

questions.hint_text: Select yes or no to continue
questions.question_text: Do you know your previous library card number?

questions.hint_text: Enter the number if you have it
questions.question_text: What is your previous library card number?

expected.title: Apply for a replacement library card
expected.what_happens_next: After submitting the form, your application will be reviewed by the library staff. If further information is needed, they will contact you via the email you provided.

prompt: Create a form to register a PAYE employer. Ask for employer name, number of employees, if they have a company registration number and if so what that is, and if they provide taxable employee benefits and if so to describe what they are.

expected.before_you_start: Ensure you have all necessary information about your business and employees before starting the form. You will need your employer name and information about your employees.
expected.description: This form collects information needed to register as a PAYE employer. Fill out the details about your business and employees.
expected.explanation: The form is designed to guide users through the registration process for a PAYE employer. It captures essential information such as the employer's name, the number of employees, and details about the company registration number and taxable employee benefits. Each question logically flows into the next, especially where conditions apply (e.g., company registration number and taxable benefits).

questions.hint_text: The legal name of your business
questions.question_text: What is your employer name?

questions.hint_text: Enter a number
questions.question_text: How many employees do you have?

questions.hint_text: This helps verify your business
questions.question_text: Do you have a company registration number?

questions.hint_text: Your official company registration number
questions.question_text: What is your company registration number?

questions.hint_text: Taxable benefits include items like car allowances
questions.question_text: Do you provide taxable employee benefits?

questions.hint_text: List the benefits provided
questions.question_text: Describe the taxable employee benefits you provide.

expected.title: Register a PAYE employer
expected.what_happens_next: After submitting the form, your information will be processed, and you will receive confirmation of your PAYE employer registration.

prompt: Create a form to request a tax refund. Ask for name, address, NI number, which year the refund is for (give a list of five), if they know the amount their owed, and if so the amount

expected.before_you_start: Make sure you have your National Insurance number and any relevant documents related to your tax payments.
expected.description: Fill out this form to request a refund on your taxes. Provide all requested information accurately.

questions.hint_text: Enter your full name as it appears on your tax records.
questions.question_text: What is your name?
What is your address?

questions.hint_text: Your NI number helps us identify your tax contributions.
questions.question_text: What is your National Insurance number?

questions.hint_text: Select the year for your tax refund request.
questions.question_text: Which tax year are you requesting a refund for?

questions.hint_text: Let us know if you have calculated your refund amount.
questions.question_text: Do you know the amount you are owed?
questions.required_error_text: Indicate if you know the amount owed

questions.hint_text: Enter the amount in pounds.
questions.question_text: What is the amount you believe you are owed?

expected.title: Request a tax refund
expected.what_happens_next: After submitting the form, you will receive confirmation of your request. Further instructions will be provided if additional information is needed.

prompt: Create a form to register to vote. Ask for name, date of birth, if they're a UK, qualifying EU, or qualifying commonwealth citizen, their main address. Check if they're a student with a term-time address, and if so ask what that address is too. Check if they want to register anonymously, and if so ask them to explain why and upload supporting evidence.

expected.before_you_start: You must be 16 or over and a British, qualifying Commonwealth, or qualifying EU citizen. You need your address details to complete this form. You can only register anonymously if you have a valid reason.
expected.description: Complete this form to register to vote in UK elections. Provide your personal details, citizenship information, and addresses. If you want to register anonymously, you will need to explain why and provide supporting evidence.

questions.hint_text: As it appears on your official documents
questions.question_text: What is your full name?
What is your date of birth?

questions.hint_text: Select if you are a British, qualifying EU, or qualifying Commonwealth citizen
questions.question_text: What is your nationality?
What is your main address?
Are you a student with a term-time address?
What is your term-time address?

questions.hint_text: This hides your details from the public electoral register
questions.question_text: Do you want to register to vote anonymously?

questions.hint_text: Give reasons for your request
questions.question_text: Explain why you want to register anonymously
questions.required_error_text: Provide a reason for registering anonymously

questions.hint_text: Upload one or more files that support your reason
questions.question_text: Upload evidence supporting your anonymous registration request

expected.title: Register to vote
expected.what_happens_next: After you submit this form, your application will be checked. You may be contacted for more information. If successful, you will be added to the electoral register and able to vote in elections.
